Token.Abstract: Stores SDK wide settings. Only instantiated in the SDK.
Publisher Provided Identification (PPID) sent with ads request.

Publisher Provided Identification (PPID) sent with ads request.

Language specification used for localization. |Language| must be formated as a canonicalized IETF BCP 47 language identifier such as would be returned by [NSLocale preferredLanguages]. Setting this property after it has been sent to the IMAAdsLoader will be ignored and a warning will be logged.
